translations: 维持治安，整顿；（对行业、活动等的）监管，监控
维护治安；监督，管制（police 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: There is growing public disquiet about the cost of such policing.
sentences.translation: 对这样的警务开支公众忧虑不断增长。

sentences.sentence: He will address us on the subject of the Community Policing Program.
sentences.translation: 他将要就社区治安计划这一主题向我们发表演说。

sentences.sentence: Washington first introduced the Community Policing Program 8 years ago.
sentences.translation: 8年前，华盛顿首次推出了社区警务计划。
